snippet.title: The Spell Brigade - Official Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description: The Spell Brigade is an online bullet hell action roguelike game developed by Bolt Blaster Games. Players will slay hordes of dark creatures and complete team-based objectives. Access upgrades and powerful spell synergies to claim victory in The Spell Brigade, launching in 2024 for PC (Steam) with a demo available now as part of Steam Next Fest.
